item.name: JVM OldGen GC Collection: Time Spent

item_prototype.name: Gather Trapper Stats for $2 for $3 interval
Gather Trapper Stats for $2 for $3 interval
Gather Trapper Stats for $2 for $3 interval

trigger.name: Cluster in red state
trigger.description: One or more primary shards is unavailable.

trigger.expression: {Template App Elasticsearch Cluster Health:es_stat[health,status,].last()}>0 and {Template App Elasticsearch Cluster Health:es_stat[health,status,].last()}<2
trigger.name: Cluster in yellow state
trigger.description: The cluster is missing one or more replica shards.

trigger.name: Elected master node changed
trigger.description: The elected master node changed. This may or may not be expected.

trigger.name: Unassigned shards: {ITEM.LASTVALUE}
trigger.description: There are unassigned shards. They could be recovering, but this should be looked at for verification.
